title: PX7 Domino Disc Lot of 7 "Beantown Find"
author: basesareempty

posts.post_title: PX7 Domino Disc Lot of 7 "Beantown Find"
posts.post_content:
Lot of 7 PX7 Domino Discs from the "Beantown Find". This was the exact lot that was offered and are in excellent condition. Only the Phillippe has a small rust patch about 1/8" long along the rim. The rest are nice and clean.They are definitely better then most that are found. Included in the lot are the following.
Cree-NY Yankees
Phillippe-Pit Pirates
Ames-NY Giants
Tinker-Chicago Cubs
Dooin-Phil Phillies
Reulbach- Chicago Cubs
Murphy-Phil A's

Above lot being offered for $175. PM if interested.
bump for final price reduction. I would really like to move these here or I will send them to PSA for grading.
